description: The variant 1 insist to cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes

start.instruction: Bring the chicken to the room temperature
start.ask: Did you bring the chicken to the room temperature?

1.instruction: Pat dry the chicken with a towel
1.ask: Did you pat dry the chicken with a towel

2.ask: Did you mix all the spices?
additionalInformation: half teaspoon of ground black pepper

3.instruction: Sprinkle the spices mixture on the chicken
3.ask: Did you sprinkle the spices mixture on the chicken?

4.instruction: Cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes
4.ask: Did you cook the chicken in the grill for 35 minutes?

description: The variant 2 insist to cook the chicken in the grill for 30 minutes

start.instruction: Bring the chicken to the room temperature
start.ask: Did you bring the chicken to the room temperature?

1.ask: Did you pat dry the chicken with a towel

2.ask: Did you mix all the spices?
additionalInformation: half teaspoon of ground black pepper

3.instruction: Sprinkle the spices mixture on the chicken
3.ask: Did you sprinkle the spices mixture on the chicken?

4.instruction: Cook the chicken in the grill for 30 minutes
4.ask: Did you cook the chicken in the grill for 30 minutes?
